descriptions.description: This reinforcing loop accelerates team growth as more core developers provide mentorship, directly increasing the promotion rate of new members into the core team.
This virtuous cycle amplifies team capability as mentorship builds contributor skills and experience, creating a larger, more qualified pipeline for core developer promotion.
This balancing loop stabilizes team size by limiting growth; as the core team expands, turnover increases, naturally counteracting further expansion.

This balancing loop creates a delayed constraint on growth; while mentorship builds skills, it initially increases the contributor pool, creating a longer, more competitive path to core developer status.
